header.title: Hi, I'm Kaelunyx
header.subtitle: I'm a bit too much for a simple website. Everything here is just the essentials... for now.

about.title: About me
about.intro: Hi, my name is Guilherme Lemos, known online as <abbr title="Kaelunyx Sylen Rivenheart">Kaelunyx</abbr> (Kaelunyx Sylen Rivenheart).
about.location: I live in Brazil, more specifically in the Northeast region. I dream of living in Canada one day.
about.age: I'm 14 years old and the developer of this entire website lol
about.more: I honestly have no idea what to write here, so if you have any questions about me, feel free to ask.

identity.title: Identity
identity.pronouns: he/they/xe/ze or any pronouns, I don’t mind
identity.more: You only know a few things...

footer.line1: My world is dark, but not sad.
